Command *scan*
***************

Documentation for the scan command in */cmds/wiz/scan.c*.

Command
=======

Wizard command "scan"
USAGE:

 |  ``"scan [-d]" to scan environment``
 |  ``"scan [-d] ob" to scan object "ob"``

List the filenames of objects in an inventory.
optional flag -d for "deep" scan (ie recrusive)
